programme.title: Ben 10 S1

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: Ben is interested in a marathon of his favourite cartoon show, 'Spazz', but when Ben goes Upgrade to get a better signal, the titular Spazz leaps from his animated dimension, bringing chaos with him!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: After the Rust Bucket breaks down at a Mobile Home Park, Ben discovers they've stumbled on to the last leg of the Cali 10 Hundred, an epic, off-road auto race.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: When the Rust Bucket runs out of gas on a foggy, East Coast road, Ben, Gwen and Max are forced to stay at a hotel being menaced by Creepy Carl - a local folklore expert, who may actually be a ghost!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: While mini-golfing, Ben is attacked by the Ground Hawgs, a gang of Dr. Animo mutants turned bikers. Ben must turn alien to stop them before they set their sights on the city down the road.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: Dr. Animo has made a scary transformation and found a way to release the very dangerous animal nature of humans, including Max's life-long friend!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: Ben discovers Steam Smythe excavating a 'House of the Future' built by Max's childhood idol, in search of a powerful device that will allow him to create devastating weapons for his war on progress.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: While Ben, Gwen and Max hike to a waterfall, the Bugg Brothers are back with a plan to duplicate Diamondhead, but their cloning ray gun fires on Max instead, multiplying him endlessly.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1

programme.title: Ben 10 S1

programme.title: Ben 10 S1

Noddy decides to investigate: who is the mysterious King of Toyland? He spots the Knights carrying a royal litter, but all he can see inside is the top of an orange crown. Realising the King's favourite colour must be orange, Noddy remembers seeing Pat-Pat painting a bowl of oranges and wonders if she knows who the King is. Pat-Pat doesn't but following the clue of a cut out crown shape in orange card and using his investigative skills Noddy works out that Cloppycorn is the King of Toyland. He was fed up being bossed around by Hoof and Bling so decided to be king for the day with a little help from Queen Sparklewings. Bling and Hoof are sorry for upsetting Noddy and everyone is friends again in time for the Royal Ball! Well done Noddy. Case closed!

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild

programme.title: Sports Detectives

programme.title: Sports Detectives

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.

programme.title: Dinotrux

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Wally and Wenda go to Turkey to find a sleeping rug for Arf. They meet a fellow Wanderer, Yasemin, and realize that their Turkish rug is actually a map to the Doubling Key! Odlulu and Fritz find the key first and cause chaos as the W's try to escape from the underground Cistern.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy is trying to read, but Raa Raa and the other jungle animals are all racing around making too much noise. Topsy is so upset she accidentally rips the last page from her book… can her friends set off on a noisy chase through the jungle to find it?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Noddy returns from a Make and Take party at Pat-Pat's and finds the Builders are constructing a big orange palace in Toy Green. by order of the King of Toyland! Noddy decides to investigate: who is the mysterious King of Toyland? He spots the Knights carrying a royal litter, but all he can see inside is the top of an orange crown. Realising the King's favourite colour must be orange, Noddy remembers seeing Pat-Pat painting a bowl of oranges and wonders if she knows who the King is. Pat-Pat doesn't but following the clue of a cut out crown shape in orange card and using his investigative skills Noddy works out that Cloppycorn is the King of Toyland. He was fed up being bossed around by Hoof and Bling so decided to be king for the day with a little help from Queen Sparklewings. Bling and Hoof are sorry for upsetting Noddy and everyone is friends again in time for the Royal Ball! Well done Noddy. Case closed!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: It has snowed in Flowertot Garden and all the tots are having fun… except Primrose who is worried she'll get dirty. Can the other tots convince her to play with them?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Dali & Cocky Prince
programme.desc: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: The Seasons

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: Pedro Penduko Episode 2 (The Return of the Comeback)
programme.desc: He is descendant of a Legendary hero, but for the young Pedro Penduko (Janno Gibbs) heroism in the silver screen is more appealing than real life bravado. But Pedro is not destined to be a movie star, he finds himself in the center of a kingdom in need of a hero.

programme.title: Full Moon
programme.desc: A young girl (Barbie Forteza) has her first brush with romance. Unluckily for her, her paramour (Derrick Monasterio) bears a dark, monstrous secret that will soon prove to be a challenge for their young love.

programme.title: Scorpio Nights 2
programme.desc: Andrew is meticulous almost to the point of obsession. His ordered existence is suddenly disrupted when one sexually adventurous student, Valerie, starts seducing him.

programme.title: My Father, Myself
programme.desc: A lawyer is left to care for a massacre survivor, who happens to be the son of his former client. His wife and daughter welcome the boy as part of the family. But as the kids get older, the daughter confesses her love for the boy.

programme.title: Ang Manananggal sa Unit 23B
programme.desc: Jewel is a mysterious woman who lives alone in the city. She has a secret which has led her to settle into a lonely existence. That is, until she meets Nico, a broken-hearted, down-and-out guy who also feels unlovable like she does.

programme.title: Huwag Mong Takasan Ang Batas
programme.desc: Nelson used to live in the boondocks as an insurgent citizen. But soon he decides to mend his ways and start life anew. He then promises himself that he will live a peaceful life and give his sister Nene, the best he could provide.

programme.title: Ang Babaeng Walang Pakiramdam
programme.desc: A woman diagnosed with a rare congenital disease that makes her incapable of feeling physical and emotional pain meets a man with cleft palate who makes her feel love like she never has before.

programme.title: Mary Cherry Chua
programme.desc: Mary Cherry Chua urban legend: High school student Mary Cherry Chua murdered by janitor. Film follows Karen (Ashley Diaz), avid reader of campus horror stories, as she encounters the legend.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: A Filipino adaptation of a South Korean film about Yuri (Bela Padilla), a woman haunted by ghosts after a car accident. Victor (Marco Gumabao), a street magician, turns her experiences into a popular horror-magic performance.

programme.title: Diary ng Panget
programme.desc: Eya (Nadine Lustre) and Cross (James Reid) didn't get along at first, their relationship becomes complicated but soon, they fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: Half-sisters Aileen and Romina, along with first cousins Ruth and Sandra, reunite in Camiguin to bury their grandmother. Accompanied by Sandra’s friend, Lucy, the five girls dare to call on the spirits of the dead when they find their old Ouija board from when they were kids.

programme.title: A Very Special Love
programme.desc: Laida is a modern-day Belle. She works hard to provide for her family so someday she will meet her prince charming and they will live happily ever after together.

programme.title: Sugat Sa Puri
programme.desc: He has been a good man all his life. A dutiful son, a loving brother, a considerate friend. But one day, armed thugs barged into his quiet life and murder his family.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E09 - Perspectives on Christmas
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E10 - Where Every Bloke Knows Your Name
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: CSI S3 E22 - Play With Fire
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S3 E14 - Falling Angels
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: Law & Order Special Victims Unit S10 E21 - Liberties
programme.desc: The Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of dedicated detectives in the NYPD, who investigate these vicious felonies. These are their stories.

programme.desc: This is the true story of Aldo Guce and his family, and how they stood upand won against bigotry and the American system of justice. Based on a well-publicized case known among Filipinos in the United States.

programme.title: Simaron
programme.desc: As a martial arts expert, a graduate of the Police Academy of America and the son of a retired general, Cris could have had all the privileges possible for a career in the armed forces. However, like many of the heroes he had idolized since childhood, he chosed to go undercover.

programme.title: Dugong Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Father and son were unknowingly pitted against each other in this tale of a man determined to hate his enemy all his life and who, one day, would exact revenge in the most cruel manner even if it took him years and years of plotting and waiting.

programme.title: Mukhang Bungo
programme.desc: Boboy (Redford White) is a stuntman living with his mother and father. After his father is killed, he takes a job as a security guard and becomes a vigilante. With the help of his fellow policemen, he tries to track down the syndicate.

programme.title: Epimaco Velasco Story, NBI
programme.desc: FPJ took on the role of the country's modern day hero, Epimaco Velasco. Presented here were some of the best known among the many celebrated cases he solved and his private life as a devoted family man.

programme.title: Pik Pak Boom
programme.desc: Two stories in one entertaining film about young people learning that happiness comes from learning how to give of one's self.

programme.title: Pitong Gamol
programme.desc: They are uneducated but smart. They are orphans but the whole neighborhood is their family. Life treats them harshly but they survive.

programme.title: Hawakan Mo At Pigilan Ang Kahapon
programme.desc: Elsa (Liza Lorena) is rushed to the hospital for an undetermined illness. Her doctor/husband Ricardo (Dante Rivero) refuses to operate her, and requests another doctor to take his place.

programme.title: Lihim
programme.desc: Bianca and her friends sailed off to the pristine and beautiful Palawan for a few days of fun. Living in the city had made them hungry for the isolation an island resort offers. But then, tragedy struck just when they were starting to have fun.

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the early 1960s, at the height of the Cold War, THE MAN FROM U.N.C.L.E. centers on CIA agent Solo (Man of Steel's Henry Cavill) and KGB agent Kuryakin (The Social Network's Armie Hammer). Forced to put aside longstanding hostilities, the two team up on a joint mission to stop a mysterious international criminal organization, which is bent on destabilizing the fragile balance of power through the proliferation of nuclear weapons and technology. The duo's only lead is the daughter of a vanished German scientist, who is the key to infiltrating the criminal organization, and they must race against time to find him and prevent a worldwide catastrophe.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: ABC News Overnight - Episode 40
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch - Episode 3
programme.desc: Bridget Brennan, James Glenday and the team chat with Nazeem Hussain about ABC parenting show The Role Of A Lifetime, Angela Bassett on her new movie Zero Day, Zak Hepburn with author Lee Child, plus Nate takes a dip in WA.

programme.title: Culture By Design - Sustainability
programme.desc: How can design help us live more sustainably? Learn how environmentally-focused architects and furniture designers in Delhi, India and Jakarta, Indonesia, are creating groundbreaking and impactful designs.

programme.title: I Was Actually There - Woomera Detention Centre Breakout
programme.desc: A demonstration against indefinite mandatory detention at Woomera detention centre attracted more than a thousand concerned citizens from all over the country. But the protest took an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Australia: An Unofficial History - Rising Voices
programme.desc: The late 1970s marks a shift in Australian cinema mirroring societal changes. It sees an influx of diverse filmmakers including women, Indigenous artists and LGBTQ+ activists who utilise film's potential for social progress.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen - Episode 3
programme.desc: It's season 2 and Derek still can't cook! With locally found ingredients, and a sprinkle of culture and character, Mark and Derek create an Indigenous-inspired feast for the people they visit along their journey.

programme.title: Paradise Kitchen Bali - Episode 9
programme.desc: Lauren dives into the fascinating world of mushrooms exploring their flavours textures and health benefits. She makes savoury mushroom sausage rolls and mushroom steaks showcasing the versatility of these earthy ingredients.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - 'Jeno' Kapitany
programme.desc: We meet a collector who has dedicated his life to finding and breeding plants from around the world.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 14
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 15
programme.desc: Host Abbey Gelmi and a panel of leading sporting minds examine all the action ahead of State of Origin Game 1 with the latest NRL news, plus AFL, A-League, Super Rugby, Super Netball and more.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 13
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 99
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 99
programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on in the morning, turn to Gemma Veness for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 99
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Diet Starts Tomorrow
programme.desc: Adam throws an Easy Entertaining afternoon tea that declares "diet starts tomorrow", with cookbook author and chef Tom Walton and Australia's favourite host Osher Gu¨nsberg.

programme.title: Heywire - Rania from Cocos Islands
programme.desc: Heywire winner Rania has bones as brittle as glass. She can't walk around her Cocos Island home, but through her advocacy, she's making the tropical island more accessible.

programme.title: Restoration Australia - New Town
programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke meets a couple turning a dilapidated orphanage into a family home. Can their restoration bring laughter and warmth back to an institutional building with a confronting history?

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Dooralong
programme.desc: Electrician Mick takes on the challenge of a lifetime when he and artist wife Belynda decide to build their dream Modernist home in the bucolic Dooralong Valley, on the New South Wales, Central Coast.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 81
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien - Episode 81
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Diet Starts Tomorrow
programme.desc: Adam throws an Easy Entertaining afternoon tea that declares "diet starts tomorrow", with cookbook author and chef Tom Walton and Australia's favourite host Osher Gu¨nsberg.

programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke meets a couple turning a dilapidated orphanage into a family home. Can their restoration bring laughter and warmth back to an institutional building with a confronting history?

programme.title: The World - Episode 77
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Dooralong
programme.desc: Electrician Mick takes on the challenge of a lifetime when he and artist wife Belynda decide to build their dream Modernist home in the bucolic Dooralong Valley, on the New South Wales, Central Coast.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 99
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 99
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Sick of his dead end, white bred existence, Jack encounters an intriguing stranger who alters his relationship with reality.

programme.title: The Italian Job (2003)

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: A Little goes a long way as Stuart and Snowbell set out across New York City to rescue a friend in danger.

programme.title: Bride Wars

programme.title: The Ugly Truth

His clever ploys, however, lead to an unexpected result.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Beast Mode
programme.desc: A Hollywood director accidentally kills his leading actor and has to find an exact duplicate to proceed with the filming. To do that, he must agree to an evil pact which unleashes a band of bloodthirsty, shape-shifting, ferocious beasts onto L.A…

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: Sheriff Dance meets the two new volunteers before Orion enters the program. Jamil and Drip go head-to-head while there is aggression in the women's pod force. Brittany and Sara to try to find a solution.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: Undercover agents Lyle Kirian and Brian Townsend embed themselves in two different but equally dangerous worlds in order to investigate suspected local gang members and the Mexican cartel.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: A Florida mother vanishes into the night after celebrating her daughter's first birthday. In their search to find her, the police seek answers from the father of her child.

programme.title: American Justice

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)

programme.title: Les Pires
programme.desc: A film crew sets up in a disadvantaged suburb of Boulogne-sur-Mer. At the end of the casting, the inhabitants are stunned: the four teenagers selected to play the leading roles are considered to be the bad lot in the suburb. Lily, Maylis, Jessy and Ryan, the happy chosen ones, cannot believe it themselves.

programme.title: Treizor
programme.desc: A father and his son have an appointment with a psychiatrist to try to understand the young man's OCD behaviour and rituals that all revolve around the number 13.

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes
programme.desc: The Tro Breizh, a 1,500 km pilgrim trail, crosses the Forest of Brocéliande, explores idyllic bays and climbs the Monts d'Arrée hills. Created in the Middle Ages, to encourage the faithful to pray to Brittany's founding saints, today heritage enthusiasts are working to put it back in the spotlight.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Roumanie, Le Charme Des Balkans
programme.desc: On the southern fringes of Eastern Europe, francophone and francophile, Romania remains little known. Yet, in the heart of its sublime landscapes, its people have succeeded in keeping their culture and traditions alive. From architectural heritage to natural parks, Romania is a land of untold surprises to explore.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Rachid Taha, Rockeur Sans Frontières
programme.desc: Having arrived in the world of French rock in the 1980s with a bitingly ironic cover version of ''Douce France'', Rachid Taha (1958-2018) embodied an exhilarating cross-cultural music style for thirty years. Refusing all forms of determinism, thwarting any attempt at assignation, Rachid the rocker remained forever a free-thinker.

programme.title: Maria Casarès, Albert Camus - Toi, Ma Vie
programme.desc: The actress Maria Casarès and the author Albert Camus had a passionate love affair as revealed by their correspondence. From 1944, the year they met, until Camus's death in 1960, they exchanged over nine hundred letters, proof of what a free woman she was, guided by truth and the absolute.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Libération(S), Dans La Joie Et La Douleur
programme.desc: Autumn 1944. While the Allies are optimistic after liberating three-quarters of the territory, the euphoria quickly fades among civilians, whose daily lives improve little.
